amendment.description: Amendment sought to exempt from the bill all rules or guidance that the Director of OMB determines would result in net job creation.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part A of House Report 114-2 to exempt from H.R. 185 all rules or guidance that the Director of the Office of Management and Budget determines would result in net job creation.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Johnson (GA) amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 178 - 247 (Roll no. 24).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Johnson (GA) amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 178 - 247 (Roll no. 24).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Johnson (GA).
